content:
# Introduction to Our Documentation System

Welcome to our modern documentation system built with **MDX**, **ShadCN**, and **React**!

<Alert type="info" title="What is MDX?">
  MDX allows you to write JSX directly in your markdown files, enabling
  interactive documentation.
</Alert>

## Features

<FeatureGrid>
  <Feature
    title="Interactive Components"
    description="Use React components directly in your markdown"
    icon={<Button size="sm">Click me</Button>}
  />
  <Feature
    title="Beautiful Styling"
    description="Pre-built components with consistent design"
  />
  <Feature
    title="Fast Search"
    description="Quick content discovery with fuzzy search"
  />
  <Feature
    title="Mobile Responsive"
    description="Works perfectly on all devices"
  />
</FeatureGrid>

## Getting Started

<Steps>
  <Step>
    **Install Dependencies** - Set up your project with the required packages
    
    <CodeBlock language="bash">
npm install
